actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: To amend section 547 of title 11, United States Code, to provide that certain withdrawal transactions made by depositors from certain financial institutions not be avoided as preferential transfers.

summary.text: Amends Federal bankruptcy law to declare that a trustee in bankruptcy shall not avoid as preferential transfers any withdrawals by depositors from an uninsured depository institution during the 90 days before such institution files for bankruptcy protection.

titles.title: To amend section 547 of title 11, United States Code, to provide that certain withdrawal transactions made by depositors from certain financial institutions not be avoided as preferential transfers.
